Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers are trying to secure their fourth trip to the World Series in the last eight years.
The Dodgers are using a bullpen game for the third time this postseason, and second against the Mets.
Manaea is 2-0 with a 2.65 ERA in playoff starts, including a Game 2 victory at Dodger Stadium against LA’s bullpen.
Miscellaneous Highlights: After three chilly games in New York, where temperatures were in the 50s and players donned knit hats and long sleeves, the series returns to the warmth of California.
Shohei Ohtani's wife, Mamiko, and their dog, Decoy, have been low-profile regulars at Dodger Stadium during the playoffs.
The Dodgers are trying to clinch their record 25th pennant at home.
Others: Dodgers first baseman Freddie Freeman’s status for Game 6 had yet to be decided.
Mets outfielder Brandon Nimmo has been playing with plantar fasciitis in his left foot.
Gavin Lux won’t start Sunday because of an injured hip that limited him to a pinch-hit appearance in Game 5.
